changeSet.comment: Insert mock data for testing only
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO generations ("statementData") VALUES ( '{ "businessName": "Test Farm", "frn": 123456789, "sbi": 987654, "email": "test@mail.com", "address": { "line1": "Test Lane", "line2": "Unit 2", "line3": "Building A", "line4": "Testville", "line5": "Testshire", "postcode": "AB12 3CD" }, "scheme": { "name": "Mock Scheme", "shortName": "MS", "year": "2025", "frequency": "Annual", "agreementNumber": "AG123456" }, "transactionDate": "2025-01-01", "calculationId": 111111111, "paymentAmount": 1234.56, "excludedFromNotify": false }' );
